arabic.title: أمى مسافرة
text: عندى عدة و عندى سى ديز
يا قشطة يا بيس يا إما كوول
أصل فيه ناس تبقى غاوية كسر
و حطيت سى ديهاتى فى بتاعة
بصيت لقيت بيته بقى حاجة تانية
و فيه ناس برة عاملين سياح
و جوة ده كان عالم تانى
و أنا واقف برقص فى مكانى

english.title: My Mother is Traveling
text: My mother is traveling, going to a funeral
I walked her to the door
And then a brilliant idea hit me
I've got the equipment and the CD's
Which means everything is running smoothly
The only thing remaining is to act
I called all my friends immediately
Now there's only one thing for me to do
I must empty the house of all furniture
You see, there are people who keep breaking stuff
And we don't want to have any quarrels
And I put my CD's in a thingy
But it's still way too early.. there's an hour to go..
I kept thinking, I asked myself
Am I just going to keep waiting?
I hooked it in and started singing
My mother is traveling and I'm throwing a party
But I hope she does not show up out of the blue
Hope our neighbors don't report us to the cops
and hope the electricity doesn't fail
don't report us to the cops
I was wearing Germany's football team jersey
I looked around, found his home became something else..
And the party was full to the brim in a second
Bang-up music, it was all Dance,
And with every minute the number of people increased
And I was standing at the door not knowing what to do
And outside there were people causing a commotion
They've come and they have weapons with them
They made me become so uncomfortable
So I locked the house up with the key
And I wrote a paper and hanged it on the door, it said:
Excuse me, I'll take responsibility for it
I decided to spoil myself for a bit then
I kept dancing and my friends were around me
Suddenly they threw me a mic
And told me: sing the song!
My mother is traveling and I'm throwing a party
But I hope she does not show up out of the blue
Hope our neighbors don't report us to the cops
and hope the electricity doesn't fail
don't report us to the cops
I've been waiting for this party
I took my car and came with it
Because of the extreme traffic around it
I couldn't find a single spot to park
So I left it by the pavement
And the view was sweet out there
There were a lot of high-class looking boys
Sweet girls that are so humerous
And inside there was an entire new universe
And as I was standing there dancing
I saw a bunch of girls I like
But I didn't really like her much
So I said, it's okay, I'll get in her good books
So I can dance with her friends!
and all the people around us left
We kept arranging and organizing things
And then we drummed and sang
My mother is traveling and I'm throwing a party
But I hope she does not show up out of the blue
Hope our neighbors don't report us to the cops
and hope the electricity doesn't fail
don't report us to the cops

arabic.title: كل ليلة بسهر
text: أنتى على بالى كل دقيقة وكل ثانية
أنتى بالنسبة لي في الحقيقة حاجة تانية
وآهي جت اللحظة اللى آجي وأقولك فيها
وأنا عمري ما قلت لأي حد حاجة زي ديا
صدقيني بجد أنا في حالة مش طبيعة
اسهري فكري بالراحة لو كنتي حاسة بيا
وأنا عايزك تعرفي اني هفضل جنبك باستمرار
أكيد الواحد مينفعش يعيش لوحده مهما ان كان
برده الانسان لازم يدور ع المكان
لما خدعني وخاني وباعني وقالي كلام
وأنا لما سمعت عرفت أنها أوهام
وافتكرت لما كانت عيني في عينك
قلتي لي انك ملكيش في الدنيا الا أنا
ولا يمكن حد يفرق بيني وبينك
في اللغز اللى أنا عايش فيه
والخطوة اللي هاخدها اني أفكر من جديد

english.title: Kol Layla Bashar
text: you are in my mind in every minute and in every second
you're really to me something else
in my eyes , you're the perfect girl , and the only one that I live by
trust me this is not a compliment
this is the truth which I'm hiding
sure that you noticed from the way I treat you
and the moment just came for me to come and say
to say what is in me , to say what is in me
to say that I'm yours , and ask you to be mine
and In my life , I never said this to anyone
trust me really I've been acting weird
stay ( stay awake at night ) think calmly If you're feeling me
answer me honestly , and don't hide on me
and I want you to know that I'll be there for you always ( beside you )
there for you all the way
even if it was hell or heaven ( in the bad times and the happy times )
without you , I'm like a guitar
every night I stay ( stay at night ) , stay and think
do you love me , or do I love you more
sure , no one can live alone , whatever happens
which he sees in his dreams
which he wanted for so long
where he can find the safety and the peace
when he deceived me and petrayed me , he said some words
and when I heard them , I knew it wasn't true
and I figured that he's trying to mess things up between us
and I remembered when my eyes were looking to yours
you told me that you don't have anyone in the world but me
and the year we spent together was here
trust me , I'm sure that you love me
and that no one can separate us
every night I stay , I stay and think
do you love me , or do I love you more
every night I stay , I stay and think
in the mystery which I'm living in
I don't know how it could be explained
yes I cherish you but ......I love her more
and the problem that you're friends
I wish you were strangers to each other
I tried to get close to her , I looked and found ( emptiness ) ....he's talking about the one he loves' best friend
and the step I'm gonna take next is to think from the start ( from all over again )
come back to me again , believe me , I miss you
do you get me ( do you understand me ) , only your love is the love to feel
do you hear me , only you , the one I love
every night I stay , stay and think
do you love me , or do I love you more

arabic.title: كلمة ما قلتهاش
text: انا مش عارف ليه كنت خايف
و يمكن ده كان احساسى انا بس
كنت رجعت للوقت لما كان حبنا بجد

english.title: A Word I Never Said
text: There are things that can be forgotten
There are things that cannot be forgotten
Still, no matter how long you walk
There are things that can be forgotten
No matter how much time passes
for words you should have said?
At times, you saw luck with your own eyes
Everything that happens to us is destined
Even if you have an umbrella
There are people that I wished
would be by my side now
that I'm sending this message to
I don't know why I was scared
to say that I am sorry
Oh, if I had said it
Try to ask yourself for one time
to get to know all people
and then some suddenly pass away
What would you do if you were in my shoes
My dearest friend became someone else
I'd wished to remain by his side
Maybe he would've listened to me..
because my brother is becoming lost in front of my eyes
they were the best of my days
and I wished to say it to him
I have the answers to questions occupying his mind
I'm saying that I am at fault
Oh, if I had said it
There are things that can be forgotten
There are things that cannot be forgotten
Still, no matter how long you walk
It's been so long since we have talked
For years we haven't gotten together
Some of our memories became forgotten
We wished to continue but didn't get the time to
And maybe that was just my feeling
It was a word that I never said
And the result is that I'm regretful
The truth is that I'm human
It's not strange that I'm at fault
And the mistake is that I remained silent
so I can do something, I gave up
I would've returned to the time when our love was true
But it's impossible to change the truth
Death took you away from me
and there is nobody out there for me now
Oh, if I had said it
There are things that can be forgotten
There are things that cannot be forgotten
Still, no matter how long you walk
Oh, if I had said it

arabic.title: لازم بكرة يبقى احلى
text: إيه يا عم إلي انت بتعمله؟

english.title: Our Future Must Improve
text: We've been staying home for long
And our life needs some change
crowded with people waiting in line
I want to escape the noise and fly away
they overtake us left and right
They park in the middle of the street
"Oh man, you've blinded us with this smoke
Find a way to fix your exhaust
C'mon, get up and sing with us"
Our future must improve and become better
if we change our lives a little bit
if we focus and make some progress
We have been running errands since morning
and we've been walking for long
and a lot of people sitting
We decided to sit and drink something
We found everyone gazing and absent-minded
and happy as they were playing backgammon
We asked them: who are you?
They said: "we are the free people who have nothing to do
Our homes are crowded and we've escaped them
And you are lost in life and absent-minded
You will stay here, sitting like this
And years will pass you by
and find the right way to think about this"
Again we went to walk out on the street
where kids were jumping over the fence
They all decided to skip school after just getting there
And no one cares for attendance nor absence
all have canes of every shape and color
So many students are absent because they have a cold
or others got tired in class and fell asleep
And I asked myself: whose fault is it,
But anyways, we keep on walking
Mahrous wanted to shave his sideburns
When we parked near his barber
we found many people waiting at his door
Turns out he's been causing a turmoil
He shaves 3 people's beards with the same razor
at the same time to save money
but he also infects them with viruses
Don't you know you're infecting people?"
"And you all are silent, not speaking a word
We were lost on the streets
We looked at the couple sitting, and were shocked
The bride's father is letting his daughter
marry a man as old as his own father..
The girl is in prep school
and wanted to study the law
they will bring into this world ever do to deserve this?
You are being a backward thinker
You must give your girl a chance
to educate herself, exactly like a boy is given this chance
So that maybe when she grows she would be able

english.title: Lazem Bokra
text: We have been sitting home for a long time, our lives nee change
the street is busy busy I want to run away from the busy streets and fly
the microbuses are insane, they close around us right and left
and in the middle of the street they park and stubborn where should I go?
You blind us with the somke, find a solution
your still in your place, stand up and sing with us
Tomorow has to be better if we change a little from our life
the change is something easy if we focus and work on it
From the morning theres (trips?) and we have been walking for a long time
I went to the cafe, I found lots of people sitting
We said we should sit, drink something becaue we are thirsty
watching t.v and playing checkers and happy
we asked them who are you? they said we are the not busy
our homes are full and we ran away
We wish to do something but we don't know what
mabye because ur not focoused and with life we are bored
ur going to keep sitting like that and life is going to go by
you have to think it right and thing right
Again we walk in the street after the busy streets
Next to us is a School, children are jumping on the wall
all of them went in the line
No one cares about the missing ones or the absnet
The teachers and the pricipal stick are in different styles
the absent has the flu, and the tired, and who is tired from the semester and died.
And I asked myself who should be blamed, the students or the teachers
And the important thing, we are walking, A B C D ..
theres lots of people on the door, making a huge fuss
You dont know what ur copying
and ur silent not talking not wanting to do better and become better
We are bored in the street theres no one around us, we found a wedding beside us
We looked at the wedding chairs, we didnt belive what we saw.
the fathor of the bride, married his daughter to someone as old as his father
The girl in the middle school and wanted to be in Law (major)
What is the babys fault that they will have?
You think like the past you have to give the girl a chance like the boy in the education
when u grow up, u might have the chance to do something great
